table_caption: Mean ± SD and number of voxels of ICC of rs-fMRI metrics including the amplitude of low-frequency fluctuation (ALFF), fractional amplitude of low-frequency fluctuation (fALFF), functional connectivity (FC), and regional homogeneity (ReHo) in two different masks where ICC <1 and 0.75 < ICC <1 in two states of awake and under anesthesia.
